name: @enjin/indexer
author: Enjin <support@enjin.io>
description: A fully featured indexer for Enjin Relaychain and Matrixchain

scripts.start: pnpm run worker && pnpm run processor && pnpm run graphql && pnpm run metrics
scripts.ci:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org enjin --project enjin-indexer ./lib && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org enjin --project enjin-indexer ./lib
scripts.schema:generate: pnpm run schema:codegen && pnpm run build && pnpm run hasura:regenerate
scripts.metadata:init: pnpm run metadata:fetch && pnpm run metadata:typegen
scripts.metadata:typegen: pnpm run metadata:merge && pnpm exec squid-substrate-typegen typegen/typegen.json
scripts.metadata:merge: rm -rf typegen/chain-specs.jsonl && cat typegen/enjin-matrixchain.jsonl typegen/canary-matrixchain.jsonl typegen/enjin-relaychain.jsonl typegen/canary-relaychain.jsonl > typegen/chain-specs.jsonl
scripts.metadata:fetch: pnpm run metadata:matrix && pnpm run metadata:relay
scripts.metadata:matrix: pnpm run metadata:enjin-matrix && pnpm run metadata:canary-matrix
scripts.metadata:relay: pnpm run metadata:enjin-relay && pnpm run metadata:canary-relay
scripts.metadata:enjin: pnpm run metadata:enjin-matrix && pnpm run metadata:enjin-relay
scripts.metadata:canary: pnpm run metadata:canary-matrix && pnpm run metadata:canary-relay
scripts.metadata:enjin-matrix: rm -rf typegen/enjin-matrixchain.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.matrix.blockchain.enjin.io --out typegen/enjin-matrixchain.jsonl
scripts.metadata:enjin-relay: rm -rf typegen/enjin-relaychain.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.relay.blockchain.enjin.io --out typegen/enjin-relaychain.jsonl
scripts.metadata:canary-matrix: rm -rf typegen/canary-matrixchain.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.matrix.canary.enjin.io --out typegen/canary-matrixchain.jsonl
scripts.metadata:canary-relay: rm -rf typegen/canary-relaychain.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.relay.canary.enjin.io --out typegen/canary-relaychain.jsonl
